mapper.select: select c.id, c.comment_id, c.user_id, si.scenery_id, si.scenery_name, ci.city_name, ci.city_id, c.comment_title, c.comment_content, c.comment_pic, c.create_time, c.modified_time from comment_info c left join scenery_info si on c.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id order by c.create_time desc

select c.id, c.comment_id, c.user_id, ui.username, si.scenery_id, si.scenery_name, ci.city_name, ci.city_id, c.comment_title, c.comment_content, c.comment_pic, c.create_time, c.modified_time from comment_info c left join scenery_info si on c.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id left join user_info ui on c.user_id = ui.user_id where si.scenery_id = #{sceneryId} order by c.create_time

select c.id, c.comment_id, c.user_id,
si.scenery_id, si.scenery_name, ci.city_name, ci.city_id, c.comment_title, c.comment_content, c.comment_pic, c.create_time, c.modified_time from comment_info c left join scenery_info si on c.scenery_id = si.scenery_id left join city_info ci on si.city_id = ci.city_id where c.comment_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comment_info (comment_id, scenery_id, user_id, comment_title, comment_content, comment_pic) values (#{commentId}, #{sceneryId}, #{userId}, #{commentTitle}, #{commentContent}, #{commentPic})
mapper.select: select scenery_name from scenery_info si where si.city_id = (select city_id from city_info ci where city_name = #{cityName})
select scenery_id from scenery_info where scenery_name = #{sceneryName}
